Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.3.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.3.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small wooden scoop shovel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small, curved-shaped piece of wood with a short worn handle. It is chipped on the edges and the tip is broken. The shovel's primitive style dates it back over 500 years.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead adventurer

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a dead man in the garb of a Free Adventurer. His skin is leather-like and turns to dust when you poke him. Any weapon he may have had is gone. There are burns on his clothes and the chain-mail armour has a melted hole.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: cloth-bound diary

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small cloth-bound diary. Many of the page edges have yellowed and blood dots the cover.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small, round gemstone emitting a faint green glow. It contains the life force of a master of sorcery. When the glow dies out, the master is no more.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: magic cube

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a cube made from a greenish-blue material; perfectly formed on all sides. Not a mark is on it. You feel a tingling sensation: it must be magic!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: metal cup

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see small metal cups, crudely made. The hammer marks are visible and mar the surface. The cups have a dull shine like low quality silver.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large tree limb

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a tree limb devoid of foliage. Seven inches across at the base, this large branch looks heavy and would be difficult to drag.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: injured villager in chains

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a villager in chains. Dried blood clogs his hair and is in streaks down his face. His breathing seems forced; intermittent coughing breaking up the wheezing.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bag of jewels

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small, dusty, fragile bag containing uncut sapphires, topazes, rubies and diamonds. A master jeweler would pay well for these gems to cut and place upon a deserving queen.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a medallion with the form of some diety; hands out-streched in front of her, palms up. The edge of the medallion has been worn smooth as if through much handling.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: chained dwarf merchant

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a hardy dwarf covered with dust chained to the chamber wall. He is spitting curses while pulling and tugging at the chains.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: iron key

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an iron key with a leather strap tied to it. The key head is in the form of two executioner's axes crossed over a noose.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: short-handled axe

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a short-handled axe, its head spotted with rust. The wooden handle has several gouges as if hit with a sword.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: short sword

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a slightly bent short sword. The handle has been worn smooth with use and several nicks can easily be seen along the blade.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead rabbit

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a freshly-killed rabbit with an arrow wound in its side. It seems odd that a recent kill would be found under loose pebbles on a mountain barren of the rabbit's usual diet.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small wooden box

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small wooden box with a keyhole in one side. It appears to be made of one solid piece of an unknown hardwood for seams cannot be detected. The wood shines as if newly treated and shows no marks of age.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large rock

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large rock blocking a southern passage. Small gaps between the rock and the tunnel walls give you a glimpse into the next room. You make out more rubble and debris and something lying on the floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: ornate ring

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a ring decorated with small serpents whose bodies make unrecognizable designs along the band of gold. The mount has claws for prongs to apparently hold a jewel; which is missing.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: pea-sized crystal ball

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small ball of crystal the size of a pea. It is translucent and cold and feels slippery to the touch.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: strong box

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a metal strong box, battered and beaten, but still in working condition. Dust and grime coat the outside and fill the keyhole in the padlock. There is no way of knowing how long this has been here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: metal key

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small, dirty metal key. If any marks had existed on the key giving a clue to what it would unlock, they were worn off long ago.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: ebony key

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an ebony key, slightly warped, but probably still usable.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small coin

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see small coins of tin, copper and silver.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see green slime along the southern doorway and ceiling, dripping down and oozing back up the wall. It would be most unwise to attempt passage to the south with the slime crawling about.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see green slime along the northern doorway and ceiling, dripping down and oozing back up the wall. It would be most unwise to attempt passage to the north with the slime crawling about.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: straw mattress

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a mattress made of straw bundled together by pieces of twine in criss-cross fashion. The straw is practically black in places.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bronze key

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large bronze key with the head of a lion. The left paw crosses under the head while the right forms the shaft of the key.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a thick, braided rope hanging from a hole in the southeast corner of the room. It is glossy as if treated with something to preserve it. No one probably knows how ancient this rope could be.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: gnawed bone

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see dead animal bones; some old, some new (and fragrant). Obviously the place doesn't get cleaned much.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see dried meats and fruits in a colorful arrangement of concentric circles. They all seem to be native to this region (from what you know of local food production).

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: swallower shark

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a bloated-bellied, toothless fish known as a swallower shark lying dead on a cutting table. The shark swallows its prey whole and then digests it, thus earning its name. The scales form a very hard, glossy hide.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: black cleaver

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a very sharp, black cleaver. The metal is foreign to you, but its quality and hardness are unmistakable - this could probably cut any material short of stone.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: racks of weapons

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see racks of weapons mounted into the wall with a lock-bar running length-wise through each one. The bars have locks on them and the bars, locks and racks all look very well made.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: ivory key

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an ivory key with the head of a goat as decoration. The eyes have been painted black and the mouth red. The detail of the goat's fur is so fine, only a master craftsman could have carved it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: barrels of wine

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see barrels of wine along the western wall. They are full and can hardly be moved. Behind the lightest barrel some kind of door can be seen set into the wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dirty cup

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see dirty cups with gunk and crude in them emitting a pungent odor of stale beer and wine. Insects freely run in and out of the cups carrying bits and pieces of yuk. These containers look very unhealthy.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: ivory door

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small ivory door inset in the western wall. It has a keyhole centered at the top and the door is about the size of a safe.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Sacred Goebel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a golden sceptre of religious significance to the drows - it is the Sacred Goebel. The bottom of the sceptre has an odd, thin shape; somewhat like the end of a key.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bronze door

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large bronze door set into the rock with no visible hinges. Pictures on the door show a man of light battling an unclear image with many drows looking on in chains. A keyhole blends in well with the engraved designs.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: gold curtain

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a gold curtain with a small keyhole on the right side. The curtain is strong and does not bend to pressure.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: open book

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an open book written in the language of the common tongue of Eamon. It is not very old and is written in the style the learned are taught.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a skeleton dressed in robes of a wizard. The bones are in a chair and the arms and head lay sprawled across an open book on the wooden table.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: metal pedestal

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a well-made, bowl-shaped pedestal consisting of a metal you cannot identify. Although debris and blackened rocks lay strewn about, the pedestal shows no signs of damage.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large green device

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large device in the center of the room emitting a faint hum. It encases the caged animals in a green glow and seems to have their complete attention. At closer examination, you notice the green device is made of emerald!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: emerald key

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a beautiful emerald key on a small gold chain.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: caged animal

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see cages containing several varieties of animals; moundmole, wild dogs and mountain bears. They show their teeth as you approach, saliva dripping from the corners of their mouths.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: steel key

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small steel key with a cord through a hole in the head of the key.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a lever made of emerald attached to the large green device. Some form of writing is next to the lever, but unfortunately you cannot read the language of the drows.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large green device

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large device in the center of the room; silent, cold and dark. The lever broken off, it would be impossible to turn it back on. If there were only some way to take that huge piece of emerald back to the Main Hall!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: magic elven bow

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a magic elven bow given to you by King Argas for completing the mission in one of two possible ways. This bow you will name upon presentation with the first arrow shot.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large, but dead, death dog

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The dog collapses with multiple chest and head wounds, breathing hard and in great pain. Unsuccessfully, it tries to get to its feet; legs too weak, claws scraping the rock floor. The legs slow, then stop.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: smoldering ash and fluids

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The magician drops to his knees, then on his side. His skin quickly darkens to black as the last breath leaves his body. Small wisps of smoke rise and then the body smolders, dissolving into ash and vile fluids.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: very ugly, very dead one-eyed ogre

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The good eye of the ogre rolls back in his head as he lets out one last, rotten-fish smelled grunt. Momentarily balanced, the body falls backward with a heavy smack!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Raj Breanok's body

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Raj Breanok fall with a wound in his side and his leg badly injured. Not able to get up, he keeps fighting while on one elbow - but to no avail. A weapon pierces his armour; he stiffens then relaxes to rise no more.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Dol Pantwell's body

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: With a mighty blow to the head, Dol is forced against the wall and then slides down into a limp heap.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead brown rat

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: With a squeal and a cough, the brown rat dies, open-mouthed and wide-eyed.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead black rat

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The black rat quivers and jerks, then settles into the dust; its new home for eternity.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead black-haired zombie

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The black-haired zombie screams with pain! He clutches a fatal wound and goes down with a surprised look on his face.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead leather-clad zombie

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The zombie ducks at the wrong time and a blow lands to the back of his head! He abruptly flattens out on the floor, silent and unmoving.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead barefoot zombie

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Someone steps on the barefoot zombie's ankle, distracting his attention. While engaged with pain, he cannot counter the thrust to his ribs. Coughing and wheezing, he slips to the floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead zombie in chain-mail

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The chain-mail screeches as a weapon makes its way through it. Gasping and clawing the air, the zombie's knees buckle and he drops to the floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead zombie patrol

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The last of the zombie patrol goes down in a blaze of undeterminable curses in an ancient, foreign tongue.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead short zombie

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The short zombie stumbles and drops quickly to the floor. He mutters something like "Az-Eye" with his last breath.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead drow soldier

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The deadly and efficient soldiers last comrade falls. Nothing marks the passing of the last battle-bred drow of a once imperial era.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead drow citizen

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Some of the citizens scamper and flee as several of their friends lie lifeless on the floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead drow guard

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The elite guard, fighting to the last man, have accomplished just that goal. He falls on his already dead brothers in arms.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead angry guard

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The angry guard tries to scratch at your eyes as he falls. His curses are caught in his throat as he has no breath left.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead drow chef

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The chef's cleaver falls from his grasp as he stands in pain and agony from his wound. He looks up with contempt and makes a gesture that you do not understand.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead old drow woman

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The woman collapses upon herself, huddled in a ball. She seems to be whispering the same word over and over again, "Az-Yi", until she becomes inaudible.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead drow diner

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The morale of the diners breaks as many fall before the onslaught. Several make their way to safety or to possibly get more help.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead drowsing drow

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Badly armed and not quite alert, the drows desperately yell shouts of alarm or help. Numbers badly reduced, they try for an exit amid the blows being landed on them...

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead drow bartender

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bartender places his hands over his head and is blubbering as he goes down. In a desperate voice for the short time that it lasts before a forever silence, he seems to plead and cry. The only word you can make out sounds like "Az-Yai".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead bar patron

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bar patron feels nothing as a weapon is withdrawn from his body. He takes two steps and raises his blade before suddenly collapsing.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead drow guard

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The guard falls on his back. He tries to get up, slowly rises and sprawls out again. He raises his arm, but it drops to the floor as his legs relax and his cheek turns to embrace the cold stone floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead high priest

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The priest clutches the robes around his neck and lifts his eyes to the ceiling. With great effort and pain, he screams "Az-Yi Tok-Ma!" before falling on his face, hand raised high in what must be some religious gesture.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead animal

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The animals drop, eyes glassy and tongues hanging limply from their open mouths. Blood trickles and fills small depressions in the floor.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e]], System.Private.CoreLib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e
